name: The Strings of Fate
description:
TW: VIOLENCE, GORE, HEAVY THEMES.

A short game, created in two days based on a story I wrote a while back, called Red String. You're trapped in the nothingness with only a path made of red strings and the faint memory of a friend inside your head. Unravel the mystery of what happened to her and maybe escape the white hell you were committed to.

It contains sound.

Better played on fullscreen.
